title: League client "Launch" button does nothing
body:
**Greetings from Tittens xD**

I have been having a few issues with my League of Legends client. 
The repair button function seems to be faulting the same.
I have never had these problems before but it has now started to occur every time I try to start the League client.

I have tried in compatability mode for Windows 7, Windows Vista etc
I have tried resetting my internet explorer settings.
I have installed all windows updates too date.
I have added exceptions to Bitdefender Total Security 2016 for League.
I have tried deleting; 
League of Legends/RADS/project/lol_air_client
League of Legends/RADS/project/lol_air_client_oc1
League of Legends/RADS/project/lol_launcher
League of Legends/RADS/project/lol_patcher
And let the game patch back up to the Launch menu and reinstall the installation files.

I am now currently uninstalling and reinstalling the entire game to see if this solves my problem,
but, does anyone have any information on why my League client decided to do this all of a sudden?

Thank you!

P.s; If it helps, my laptop has 6gb RAM, i5 processor and Intel HD 4000 graphics.

***UPDATE* - Reinstalling the game did nothing, BUT, even though my network was trusted and all exceptions added too Bitdefender Total Security 2016, after uninstalling Bitdefender it worked.
I believe that this anti virus was still restricting access but I am not aware of how and why!

If anyone has information on this PLEASE let me know!**

replies.body:
Hey Tittens,

This may be due to a connection issue. Please try the solutions provided in the Troubleshooting Connection Issues Riot Games Player Support article:
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues

I believe you are correct, my firewall was blocking outgoing connections which is what you need open to be able to connect to League.
I believe anyway..

Thank you!
